Author: Cyboran
Name: Final Fantasy 7 Remake/Rebirth UI Bars
Description:
A plugin that makes Final Fantasy 7 Remake/Rebirth UI, such as a health bar for the player.
If you have any questions, issues or suggestions, please post an issue in the github or ping me in the Discord!
Punchline: HP bar, MP bar, EXP bar.
Changelog: Forked from original KH Plugin for personal use.
